an5.2:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim:
an5.2:2.3: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an5.2:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako hirima hoti, hiriyati kayaduccaritena vaciduccaritena manoduccaritena, hiriyati papakanam akusalanam dhammanam samapattiya.
an5.2:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ottappi hoti, ottappati kayaduccaritena vaciduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati papakanam akusalanam dhammanam samapattiya.
an5.2:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.2:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an5.2:7.2: ‘saddhabalena samannagata bhavissama sekhabalena, hiribalena … ottappabalena … viriyabalena … pannabalena samannagata bhavissama sekhabalena’ti.
